result.execSummary:
The defendant Steven M. Zelich was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 1st-Degree Reckless Homicide [Modifiers: Use of a Dangerous Weapon], a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.02(1).
  • Hiding a Corpse, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.11(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: If probation or extended supervision is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and governmental entities for the balance due.  Collections may include income assignment.  This applies to all counts and financial obligations.

Obey all of the rules and regulations of supervising probation agent.  Pay supervision fees.
*   Pay all court costs including all applicable surcharges.
*   Defendant is ordered to submit to a DNA sample & pay DNA surcharge and notice is given.

Ct 1 - 45yrs WSP; initial confinement of 35yrs followed by 10yrs of ES
Ct 2 - 6yrs WSP concurrent to count 1; initial confinement of 3yrs followed by 3yrs of ES

Deft not eligible for CIP or ERP

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  DDA Graveley & ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty J. Smith & Atty S. Krohn.  Victim rights compliance.  All parties have reviewed the PSI.  No factual corrections.  Sentencing arguments given by both DDA Graveley & Atty J. Smith.  Deft briefly spoke on his behalf.  On count 1 - deft is sentenced to 45yrs WSP; initial confinement of 35yrs followed by 10yrs of ES.  See conditions.  On count 2 - Deft sentenced to 6yrs WSP concurrent to count 1; initial confinement of 3yrs followed by 3yrs of ES.  Attys stipulate to credit in the amount of 644 days.  Deft not eligible for CIP or ERP.  Court reserves the right to amend the deft's conditions of ES for the reasons set forth on the record.  Appeal rights.  DNA ordered; notice given to deft.  Firearm warning.  Voting acknowledgment.
from Jenny
from Rose G
Second Amended Information

Minutes:  Clerk/T. Lehman.  DDA Graveley & ADA Burgoyne appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty J. Smith & Atty S. Krohn.  Case is resolved.  Second amended information filed.  Deft pleads guilty to both counts; found guilty by the Court.  PSI ordered.  Sentencing set for 3/30/16 @ 1:30pm.
